they begin setting up with the original plan .

output.sentences: In the morning, the group gathered near the facility.
They were setting into motion, a plan to restore the town to its original state.
They even had lunch at a suprise location which was the lake.
They gathered lists of what was needed for the proper vegetation, and planted them by every building.
The job they executed was done in no time thanks to how well they all cooperated.
